Articles.Content: I hate to do this to you, as I do understand this is the most annoying kind of message to get for a mod maker, but as I literally can't off Eve without your help I feel the need to ask if you have an ETA for the next update for this mod? Please?

On 7/10/2017 at 4:04 AM, NomenNescio said:

I hate to do this to you, as I do understand this is the most annoying kind of message to get for a mod maker, but as I literally can't off Eve without your help I feel the need to ask if you have an ETA for the next update for this mod? Please?

I think it's a worthwhile question by now. I certainly know @JoePatrick knows I will need this mod for KSA in v1.3.x But I'm still waiting on 5 other mods to update so haven't bugged him about it yet

Here's an update for you all

Before July I was unable to work on my mods due to exams, they've since finished so I now have the time to work on them.

I've recently been working on other stuff (this for example, if people are interested) but I'm gonna spend some time on KerBalloons next.

I am going away for 2 weeks on 25th July, I will get a 1.3 patch out before then and when I get back I'll carry on with working on the new stuff (like hover mode and Jool balloons)

I'll try to keep you all updated, my YouTube channel will probably have a few videos going up of the new features as I test them - I'll try to remember to link them here as well

 

Thanks for all your patience

 

edit:
Okay so I've got it working in 1.3, the issue was that squad changed the way part categories load slightly,
I haven't done a full test of every balloon from surface to burst altitude but it all seems to work as it before, if you find any issues let me know
The update is uploaded and pending approval, I'll post when it's available - usually within an hour or so, sometimes more, sometimes less

Edited July 18, 2017 by JoePatrick1

thanks dude! I'm now one step closer to v1.3 have a good trip

that video is cool - but is it KSP related at all?

Edited July 18, 2017 by Drew Kerman

v0.4.3 Released for KSP 1.3

Changelog 

-Recompiled for KSP 1.3

thanks dude! I'm now one step closer to v1.3 have a good trip

Thanks

Not KSP related, just what I've been getting up to which has kept me from KSP modding

Edited July 18, 2017 by JoePatrick1

Thank you so much for the update, it's been eagerly awaited and is deeply appreciated. I have run into an issue, but it's so minor it's barely worth mentioning ...But I'm still going to. It's this:

There are two identical kerballoons tabs. I suspect this might have something to do with the issue you mentioned with Squad changing things around. Just thought you should know.

36 minutes ago, NomenNescio said:

Thank you so much for the update, it's been eagerly awaited and is deeply appreciated. I have run into an issue, but it's so minor it's barely worth mentioning ...But I'm still going to. It's this:

There are two identical kerballoons tabs. I suspect this might have something to do with the issue you mentioned with Squad changing things around. Just thought you should know.

Did you copy the 'Source' folder into your game directory because I forgot to remove the .dll from there which would cause it to load twice?

52 minutes ago, JoePatrick1 said:

Did you copy the 'Source' folder into your game directory because I forgot to remove the .dll from there which would cause it to load twice?

Oohh. I was wondering what that was. Should I delete the entire folder? Or just the .dll?

Edited July 18, 2017 by NomenNescio

57 minutes ago, NomenNescio said:

Oohh. I was wondering what that was. Should I delete the entire folder? Or just the .dll?

You can just delete the whole folder, you don't need it but it's required by Squad to include it in the download

Okay, this is seriously strange, but after extensive testing this mod is definitely the cause. With this mod installed my rapier engines lose most of their oomph. They can't get me into orbit. It makes no sense, but there's zero doubt here.

Edit: Is it possible your mod is messing with the aerodynamics?

Edited July 22, 2017 by NomenNescio

On 22/07/2017 at 10:58 AM, NomenNescio said:

Okay, this is seriously strange, but after extensive testing this mod is definitely the cause. With this mod installed my rapier engines lose most of their oomph. They can't get me into orbit. It makes no sense, but there's zero doubt here.

Edit: Is it possible your mod is messing with the aerodynamics?

I know you say you've done extensive testing but I can't see any possible way for this mod to affect other parts, no aerodynamics or anything is changed.
You can check the source code here and you will see only parts with the 'ModuleKerBalloons' module have anything done to them

Is it actually the case that KerBallons specific contracts are not generated?

When fixing this, will the contracts be compatible to

and

?

Thanks in advance.

17 hours ago, JoePatrick1 said:

I know you say you've done extensive testing but I can't see any possible way for this mod to affect other parts, no aerodynamics or anything is changed.
You can check the source code here and you will see only parts with the 'ModuleKerBalloons' module have anything done to them

Hmm.... It's mystery then. I'll see what I come up with. In the mean time could you do me a favor and just see if you can replicate the issue?

EDIT:

I was being dumb. Somehow didn't grab the GameData files, but the actual source. Or CKAN did. Manual download from Curse should work as it has the actual GameData files...

Edited August 26, 2017 by Box of Stardust

So I tried the balloon, and it was kind of fun for a moment. But sadly, the one thing that is badly missing is that Kerbin has no winds. The balloon just goes up and the planet slowly revolves under it, but there is no sense of a real balloon adventure.

I wonder if this could be faked. Maybe a built-in invisible sideways thrust in a random direction.

For some reason, the balloons are not showing up for me. The parachutes are there, but no other parts and no custom category.

EDIT: So, the parts will show up if I look for them in advanced mode (i.e., by module, by resource, etc.).

Edited November 9, 2017 by HotSandwich

I'm finally jumping over to v1.3.1 and took a look at this - it's the same problem as Kerbalism and other mods from v1.3 that used custom categories - they won't show up anymore in v1.3.1. Here's a MM patch that will place everything in the Science tab - at some point I may do a CCK patch too but for now this'll do. Basic testing shows the balloons still work once you can find the parts to build something with them. 

@PART[*Balloon*]:NEEDS[KerBalloons]:FINAL { @category = Science }

Still, hope @JoePatrick1 is able to come back and do a proper update at some point - would very much like the hover features!

On 12/25/2017 at 4:12 AM, Drew Kerman said:

  


@PART[*Balloon*]:NEEDS[KerBalloons]:FINAL { @category = Science }

 

What am i supposed to do with that?

1 hour ago, Clockwork13 said:

What am i supposed to do with that?

stick it in a text file, name it whatever you want with a .cfg extension and stick it anywhere in your GameData folder. Obviously make sure you have Module Manager installed as well
Is it possible to keep the balloon at a chosen height, maybe deflate it just enough mid flight so it hovers?

4 hours ago, MkFilipe said:

Is it possible to keep the balloon at a chosen height, maybe deflate it just enough mid flight so it hovers?

no, but in the latest update the developer was working on it was. Hopefully he'll have a chance to come back and finish it up for release at some point
